content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the context of the development alluded to in the image?

choices.label: As the First World War went on, fighting spread to areas outside of Europe, such as Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.
As the fighting became stalemated during the First World War, revolutions toppled regimes.
European powers sought to take advantage of the First World War to expand their empires.
The mandate system created after the First World War led to local uprisings against foreign rule.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
